translation.tagalog: Hello po, good afternoon. Danica Santos Bernabe. Kaya na po ba ito? Regarding lang po ito sa Maya Bank.
translation.english: Hello, good afternoon. Danica Santos Bernabe. Is this her? This is just regarding Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Hello po ma'am, good afternoon po.
Pwede po ba kay Danica Santos Bernabe?
translation.english: Can I speak with Danica Santos Bernabe?

translation.tagalog: Hi ma'am, this is Erica, Financial Officer ng AMD Collection. Calling in behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line.
translation.english: Hi Ma'am, this is Erica, Financial Officer from AMD Collection, calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line.

translation.tagalog: For the security lang ma'am, please confirm po. The last part of the mobile number na ginamit ni Maya is 7049. Tama po ba?
translation.english: For security, Ma'am, please confirm — the last part of the mobile number used in Maya is 7049, is that correct?

translation.tagalog: Mm-mm. Ah, yung Maya ko kasi nabalwa yung phone ko, kaya hindi ko maaari. Nag-send ako ng email sa Maya, tapos mag-contact ako, then hindi pa ako nababalikan.
translation.english: Mm-hmm. Ah, my phone got lost so I can't access it. I sent an email to Maya and contacted them but haven’t received a response.

translation.tagalog: Ano po ba meron sa account niya ma'am? Ano po ba ito?
translation.english: What seems to be the issue with your account, Ma'am? What is this about?
What seems to be the reason, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: meron kasi ako mga ano dun, mga Maya loan.
translation.english: I have some Maya loans there.

translation.tagalog: Nag-send ako ng yung SIM card ko na gamit dun, pinablack ko dun sa globe.
translation.english: I had my SIM card blacklisted with Globe.

translation.tagalog: Okay, but ano po kayo ito ma'am?
translation.english: Okay, but what kind of action are you taking, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ano po ba ito? Action po ba ito?
translation.english: What exactly is this? Is this an action?

translation.tagalog: Ano na yan? Ilang months na December pa?
translation.english: How many months has it been? Since December?

translation.tagalog: Ah. Opo. December pa. Okay ma'am. Ano to? May nareceive kayo ma'am na text?
translation.english: Ah, yes, since December. Did you receive any texts, Ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ano na yan? Ilang months na December pa?
translation.english: How many months has it been? Since December?
And did you click any links?

translation.tagalog: Ano siya, ma'am? May gumamit ng ibang account?
Okay po. Okay po. I-note ko na lang.
Nag-aantay ako ng email sa ano?
translation.english: I’m waiting for an email reply.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. I-note ko na lang. Inaantay niyo po yung reply.
translation.english: Okay, I’ll just note that. You’re waiting for a reply.

translation.tagalog: Yung sa Maya na What? may service, eh ang hirap nung kontakin eh.
translation.english: It’s from Maya, their service is really hard to contact.

translation.tagalog: Opo. Sa email nila ma'am. Na-email niyo siya. May ticket number po ba naibigay sa inyo?
translation.english: Yes, Ma'am. You emailed them — did they give you a ticket number?

translation.tagalog: Kasi nagkukul ako, tapos nangihiya ako na yung live chat ba para mabilis.
translation.english: I called them, even tried live chat hoping it’d be quicker.

translation.tagalog: Bali ma'am, ganito ma'am. Ano kayo ma'am? Ah. Pag-update kayo sa supportatmaya.ch para mabigyan kayo ng ticket number.
translation.english: Ma'am, you can update at support@maya.ph so you can be given a ticket number.

translation.tagalog: Hmm. Paano yun? Eh hinihingiin yung email, tapos yung mga number na dati.
translation.english: But how? It asks for the email and old numbers.

translation.tagalog: Eh yung phone ko nga nang wala, then nagamit ng iba yung...
translation.english: But my phone was lost and someone else used it...

translation.tagalog: Ah. Number lang naman dun ma'am. Ang hinihingi nila ma'am. Para makita yung account ninyo.
translation.english: Ah, it’s mostly the number they ask for so they can check your account.

translation.tagalog: Hmm. Pero di ba paki-update tong number
translation.english: Please update this number then, in case someone calls.
Yes, this number is already here, Ma'am.

translation.tagalog: ko na to para in case lang na may

translation.english: What we need from you, Ma'am, is an update regarding your concern with Maya so we can note it here.

translation.tagalog: Nandito naman po yung number niyo.
translation.english: We really need a ticket number to validate.
Okay, okay. I’ll try updating again.

translation.tagalog: Bali, ang ano na lang namin ma'am. Ang hinihingi nila kayo ng update po. Regarding sa concern niyo dun kay Maya. Para ma-i-note po namin dito.

translation.english: I’ve tried so many times already.

translation.tagalog: Kailangan kasi namin may ticket number para ma-validate din po.
translation.english: Yes, Ma'am, that’s really needed to validate this.

translation.tagalog: Okay, okay. So mag-try ulit akong mag-update.
translation.english: Why is it taking so long to update?

translation.tagalog: Ilang beses na nga akong nag-try eh.
Opo. Kailangan talaga yun ma'am. Para ma-validate to ma'am.

translation.english: Yes. Many are contacting them, Ma'am. You can email support@maya.ph.

translation.tagalog: Opo. Opo. Ah, maraming din kasi kutumumontak sa nila ma'am. Bali, pwede kayo mag-email ma'am sa support at maya.ph.
translation.english: Yes. Yes. Ah, many people also contact them, ma'am. So you can email ma'am at support@maya.ph.

translation.tagalog: Magkukul na. Ay tapos pa naman. Meron ba isang number dyan na 0927?
translation.english: Ending the call now. And it’s already done. Is there a number there 0927?

translation.tagalog: 3? 113? Ah, meron dito ma'am yung 3 1 sa dulo.
translation.english: 3? 113? Ah, ma'am, there’s a 3 and a 1 at the end here.

translation.tagalog: Oo, nagamit. Hindi yan pakibura yan kasi yan din yung gumamit.
translation.english: Yes, it was used. Don’t delete it because that’s what they used.

translation.tagalog: pinalitan nila yung mga numbers para sa kanila mag-update yung Maya. Nung time na ano nga ginamit nila ako.
translation.english: They changed the numbers so Maya would update for them at the time they used me.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Okay po, sige po. Sige ma'am, noted naman siya dito. Bali, eto ma'am na ano...
translation.english: Okay. Alright, ma'am. It’s noted here. So, here’s, ma'am, what...

translation.tagalog: Eto, dito na lang kayo mag-update sa number na to.
translation.english: Here, you can just update with this number.

translation.tagalog: Tapos mag-send ako ulit ngayon ng email.
translation.english: Then I’ll send another email now.
Then I’ll wait for the ticket.
how I can call you, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ah, mali. Pwede po ma'am ang mangyari. Matatawagan pa rin naman kayo ma'am kasi nandito sa aming account niyo. Pag may tumawag sa inyo ulit na agent ma'am, pwede niyo po...
translation.english: Ah, no. It can still happen, ma'am. You can still be called because you’re in our account. When another agent calls again, ma'am, you can...
I can manage, ma'am. Okay, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Apo, any question pa ma'am? Okay na pa. Sige po ma'am. Maraming salamat po.
translation.english: Yes, ma'am, any more questions? Are we done? Okay, ma'am. Thank you very much.

translation.tagalog: May nabibigay din sa inyo po.
translation.english: Something is also being given to you.
